mapper.sql: user_id, login_account, email, mobile, login_password, login_token, login_type, share_man, area, disabled, createtime, modified_time, pay_password, mem_id, use_pay_password
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM sysuser_account WHERE login_token=#{token};

select
distinct
*
from sysuser_account
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sysuser_account (user_id, login_account, email, mobile, login_password, login_token, login_type, share_man, area, disabled, createtime, modified_time, pay_password, mem_id, use_pay_password ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usePayPassword,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
